comment.author: 28288340@N03
comment._content: The aircraft tail fin designates it as an F4B-4.

comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content:
Although classic black and white, the above is clearly a modern photo of Boeing F4B-4 BuNo 9241 c/n 1757 (1970s?), which is preserved and is currently on display at the NASM in Washington, DC.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/25538536@N02/7646508914/]

Only a few Bureau Numbers after they dropped the "A".
